description: Developing and enhancing Angular applications with a focus on scalability, maintainability, and personalised user experiences. Integrating advanced analytics capabilities to improve data tracking and reporting for business decision-making.

Designed and implemented modern, high-performance Angular applications. Improved UI responsiveness and reduced system complexity. Delivered data-driven features and analytics solutions to support user engagement and growth.

Modernised front-end architecture for SaaS platforms, introducing SEO-friendly rendering techniques and optimised performance. Implemented analytics enhancements to improve conversion rates and user experience.

Delivered high-quality Angular solutions with a focus on user onboarding and engagement. Introduced quality monitoring tools and analytics to improve performance, accessibility, and user journey completion rates.

Redesigned and optimised responsive Angular applications to improve usability and accessibility. Implemented automated testing, enhanced analytics tracking, and integrated secure payment and authentication features.

Created mobile-first, user-friendly Angular solutions to improve customer journeys and conversion rates. Delivered customisation features and integrated analytics to provide insights into user behaviour.
Built scalable Angular applications with state management and modular architecture. Collaborated with teams to enhance analytics capabilities and optimise the online shopping experience.
Led development of enterprise Angular applications with a focus on scalability and security. Integrated analytics solutions to improve data visibility and compliance monitoring.
Led teams in delivering performant Angular applications with micro-frontend architecture. Enhanced analytics integration and data flow to support product insights and user engagement strategies.
Directed front-end development for mission-critical AngularJS applications with offline capabilities. Designed analytics-enabled solutions to improve operational performance and decision-making.
